articles.author: Entertainment Bureau
articles.title: RRR Is Not Bollywood Film, Rajamouli Makes BIG Statement Amid Golden Globe Win for Naatu Naatu - News18
articles.description: At the RRR screening with Directors Guild of America recently, SS Rajamouli said that his magnum opus is 'not a Bollywood film'.
articles.content: Amid a massive victory at the 80th Golden Globes and strong Oscar buzz, filmmaker SS Rajamouli has made a big statement, saying that his acclaimed magnum opus RRR is not a Bollywood movie. Rajamouli … [+1470 chars]

articles.author: Carrington Clarke, Lucy Sweeney, Lucia Stein
articles.title: The eerie parallels between January 6 and the chaos unleashed by fans of the 'Trump of the Tropics' - ABC News
articles.description: Wearing shirts in the green and yellow of Brazil's flag, a crowd of thousands shouted "the time has come" as they marched on congress. What unfolded next was an eerily familiar spectacle that has drawn comparisons to America's January 6 attack.
articles.content:
They arrived in crowded buses from all over Brazil, joining others camped outside army barracks before taking to the streets in protest. 
Wearing shirts in the green and yellow of the country's flag… [+15774 chars]

articles.title: Connor Bedard ranked top North American skater for the 2023 NHL draft - Sportsnet.ca
articles.description: Regina Pats' centre Connor Bedard is ranked the top North American skater ahead of the 2023 draft in the NHL Central Scouting Bureau's midseason rankings released Friday.
articles.content: Canadas Connor Bedard celebrates his second goal of the game in the second period of IIHF World Junior Hockey Championship action against Austria in Halifax on Thursday, December 29, 2022. (Darren Ca… [+10 chars]
